Package src.pieces

Class Pawn

java.lang.Object
src.pieces.Piece
src.pieces.Pawn
public class Pawn extends Piece
Represents a pawn piece in a game of chess.

      Specified by:

    • validateElim

      public boolean validateElim(int[] location, int[] move, int player, Piece enemy)
      Validates if a Pawn is allowed to eliminate another Piece.
      Specified by:
      validateElim in class Piece
      Parameters:
      location - the pawn is currently at.
      move - symbolizes the destination of a Pawn.
      player - currently trying to move the Pawn.
      enemy - that is being attacked by the current player.
      Returns:
      True if the elimination move is valid.
